trans-unit.source: Add a note to the change log
trans-unit.target: Add a note to the change log

trans-unit.source: Add font/woff2 to supplement type, since its not in SMI. [jensens]
trans-unit.target: Add font/woff2 to supplement type, since its not in SMI. [jensens]

trans-unit.source: Added Five/Zope3 interface bridges and implements [tiran]
trans-unit.target: Added Five/Zope3 interface bridges and implements [tiran]

trans-unit.source: Added Office 2007 mime types to the mime.types file, which was copied from Apache ages ago. The current version of Apache doesn’t contain those yet, nor does the shared-mime-info. Care must be taken when this file is updated again to make sure those mime types are not removed accidentally. [sidnei]
trans-unit.target: Added Office 2007 mime types to the mime.types file, which was copied from Apache ages ago. The current version of Apache doesn’t contain those yet, nor does the shared-mime-info. Care must be taken when this file is updated again to make sure those mime types are not removed accidentally. [sidnei]

trans-unit.source: Added metadata.xml file to the profile. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Added metadata.xml file to the profile. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Added support for real globs, using fnmatch.translate and re.compile and a migration function that will be run from Plone 2.1.1 migration, with some tests specific for globs read from shared-mime-info. [dreamcatcher]
trans-unit.target: Added support for real globs, using fnmatch.translate and re.compile and a migration function that will be run from Plone 2.1.1 migration, with some tests specific for globs read from shared-mime-info. [dreamcatcher]

trans-unit.source: Added text/x-html-safe mime type for new transformation [tiran]
trans-unit.target: Added text/x-html-safe mime type for new transformation [tiran]

trans-unit.source: Allow exception MimetypeRegistry in python scripts. Refs http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/12061. [thomasdesvenain]
trans-unit.target: Allow exception MimetypeRegistry in python scripts. Refs http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/12061. [thomasdesvenain]

trans-unit.source: Augment known mimetypes with Windows mimetypes, if available. [dreamcatcher]
trans-unit.target: Augment known mimetypes with Windows mimetypes, if available. [dreamcatcher]

trans-unit.source: Change some mimetypes returnd by guessMime to match the mimetypes registered in mtr (from freedesktop.org’s mime database). [csenger]
trans-unit.target: Change some mimetypes returnd by guessMime to match the mimetypes registered in mtr (from freedesktop.org’s mime database). [csenger]

trans-unit.source: Changed fixUpSMIGlobs not to reinitialize the smi_mimetypes, when they are already initialized during tool creation. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Changed fixUpSMIGlobs not to reinitialize the smi_mimetypes, when they are already initialized during tool creation. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Changed version to stick to Archetypes version. [tiran]
trans-unit.target: Changed version to stick to Archetypes version. [tiran]

trans-unit.source: Cleaned up major parts of PT by removing the python only implementation which was broken anyway [tiran]
trans-unit.target: Cleaned up major parts of PT by removing the python only implementation which was broken anyway [tiran]

trans-unit.source: Cleaned up package metadata and general code. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Cleaned up package metadata and general code. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Cleanup: isort, autopep8, utf8 headers, manual cleanup, security decorators. [jensens]
trans-unit.target: Cleanup: isort, autopep8, utf8 headers, manual cleanup, security decorators. [jensens]

trans-unit.source: Compile the 750KiB freedesktop.org.xml file to a binary format which gets loaded on Zope startup instead of reparsing the XML file each time. If the modification time of the source xml file changes, the binary file is automatically recreated. If the binary file cannot be created the xml file is reparsed each time as before. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Compile the 750KiB freedesktop.org.xml file to a binary format which gets loaded on Zope startup instead of reparsing the XML file each time. If the modification time of the source xml file changes, the binary file is automatically recreated. If the binary file cannot be created the xml file is reparsed each time as before. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Convert import step to be registered in ZCML partially fixing #8350 [kiorky]
trans-unit.target: Convert import step to be registered in ZCML partially fixing #8350 [kiorky]

trans-unit.source: Converted usage of zLOG to new Python logging module. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Converted usage of zLOG to new Python logging module. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Declare package dependencies and fixed deprecation warnings for use of Globals. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Declare package dependencies and fixed deprecation warnings for use of Globals. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Do not modify the portal_skins tool configuration [wichert]
trans-unit.target: Do not modify the portal_skins tool configuration [wichert]

trans-unit.source: Don’t depend on ZODB version directly. Rely on Zope dependency
trans-unit.target: Don’t depend on ZODB version directly. Rely on Zope dependency

trans-unit.source: Don’t log redefine warning if the currrent and the new object are equal [tiran]
trans-unit.target: Don’t log redefine warning if the currrent and the new object are equal [tiran]

trans-unit.source: Don’t return acquisition wrapped mimetype items beause they may lead to memory leaks. [tiran]
trans-unit.target: Don’t return acquisition wrapped mimetype items beause they may lead to memory leaks. [tiran]

trans-unit.source: Download the latest release from freesdesktops org shared mime info project page.
trans-unit.target: Download the latest release from freesdesktops org shared mime info project page.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that lookup doesn’t return an empty tuple if asked with a mimetypestring returned by guessMime. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/7876 [csenger]
trans-unit.target: Ensure that lookup doesn’t return an empty tuple if asked with a mimetypestring returned by guessMime. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/7876 [csenger]

trans-unit.source: Fix bug due to removed version.txt in 1.6.2. [wichert]
trans-unit.target: Fix bug due to removed version.txt in 1.6.2. [wichert]

trans-unit.source: For the sake of sanity, include a ‘mime.types’ with MimetypesRegistry to minimize the platform-specific differences in mime detection when the python ‘mimetypes’ module is involved. [dreamcatcher]
trans-unit.target: For the sake of sanity, include a ‘mime.types’ with MimetypesRegistry to minimize the platform-specific differences in mime detection when the python ‘mimetypes’ module is involved. [dreamcatcher]

trans-unit.source: Go back to using getToolByName for CMF tools. [nouri]
trans-unit.target: Go back to using getToolByName for CMF tools. [nouri]

trans-unit.source: How to update the mimetypes registry from freedesktop.org
trans-unit.target: How to update the mimetypes registry from freedesktop.org

trans-unit.source: If you want to use the updated mimetypes registry database from the version after 2.0.6 and you don’t have important customizations you need to keep, just delete the old
trans-unit.target: If you want to use the updated mimetypes registry database from the version after 2.0.6 and you don’t have important customizations you need to keep, just delete the old

trans-unit.source: In the case all else fails, try to resort to guess_content_type so that at least we don’t get ‘text/plain’ when the file is in fact a binary file. [dreamcatcher]
trans-unit.target: In the case all else fails, try to resort to guess_content_type so that at least we don’t get ‘text/plain’ when the file is in fact a binary file. [dreamcatcher]

trans-unit.source: Include aliases in the list of mimetypes for a entry. Based on patch by Jean Jordaan [dreamcatcher]
trans-unit.target: Include aliases in the list of mimetypes for a entry. Based on patch by Jean Jordaan [dreamcatcher]
Lookup by extensions (not glob) as submitted and retry it with lower case to catch filenames like ‘file.TXT’ [csenger]

trans-unit.source: Mime type links are now urllib quoted. This fixes #682 (http://dev.plone.org/archetypes/ticket/682). [rocky]
trans-unit.target: Mime type links are now urllib quoted. This fixes #682 (http://dev.plone.org/archetypes/ticket/682). [rocky]

trans-unit.source: More a workaround than a fix for [ 1056252 ] Content type algorithm can be confused. [tiran]
trans-unit.target: More a workaround than a fix for [ 1056252 ] Content type algorithm can be confused. [tiran]

trans-unit.source: More significant icon for application/msword files. From http://www.famfamfam.com/ Closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/11336. [thomasdesvenain]
trans-unit.target: More significant icon for application/msword files. From http://www.famfamfam.com/ Closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/11336. [thomasdesvenain]

trans-unit.source: Move icons from skins folder to a browser resourceDirectory nameed “mimetype.icons”. Adopt guess_icon_path to return the new location. [jensens]
trans-unit.target: Move icons from skins folder to a browser resourceDirectory nameed “mimetype.icons”. Adopt guess_icon_path to return the new location. [jensens]

trans-unit.source: Optimize images and icon file sizes. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Optimize images and icon file sizes. [hannosch]

trans-unit.target: Provide a registry of mimetypes, accessible via the

trans-unit.target: Purged old Zope 2 Interface interfaces for Zope 2.12 compatibility. Consider branching before this revision if release required before Plone 4. [elro]

trans-unit.target: Remove outdated and unused (whole plone core) STRING_TYPES declaration from

trans-unit.source: Removed tests/runalltests.py and tests/framework.py as they have outlived their usefulness. To run tests use Zope’s testrunner: ./bin/zopectl test –nowarn -s Products.MimetypesRegistry [stefan]
trans-unit.target: Removed tests/runalltests.py and tests/framework.py as they have outlived their usefulness. To run tests use Zope’s testrunner: ./bin/zopectl test –nowarn -s Products.MimetypesRegistry [stefan]

trans-unit.source: Split yet another part of register() into a separate method. Cleanup smi_mimetypes initialize a little bit to to use the new method when adding new mimetypes to a already-registered entry. [dreamcatcher]
trans-unit.target: Split yet another part of register() into a separate method. Cleanup smi_mimetypes initialize a little bit to to use the new method when adding new mimetypes to a already-registered entry. [dreamcatcher]

trans-unit.source: The side-effect of this is that in unix, the Python ‘mimetypes’ module would happily read ‘/etc/mime.types’ and gracefully work (/etc/mime.types has most of the extensions of shared-mime-info but a few), where on Windows it would fail to detect mimetypes by extension. [dreamcatcher]
trans-unit.target: The side-effect of this is that in unix, the Python ‘mimetypes’ module would happily read ‘/etc/mime.types’ and gracefully work (/etc/mime.types has most of the extensions of shared-mime-info but a few), where on Windows it would fail to detect mimetypes by extension. [dreamcatcher]

trans-unit.target: Updated freedesktop.org shared-mime-info from the shared-mime-info-0.23.tar.bz2 file. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Updated icons to a more modern set from Tango and Plone. [limi]
trans-unit.target: Updated icons to a more modern set from Tango and Plone. [limi]

trans-unit.source: Use a SAX-based parser instead of minidom to improve Zope startup time (by 17 seconds on my Pismo) and memory footprint. [dreamcatcher]
trans-unit.target: Use a SAX-based parser instead of minidom to improve Zope startup time (by 17 seconds on my Pismo) and memory footprint. [dreamcatcher]

trans-unit.source: added a method to detect mimetypes of zipped files, here specialy for OOo now all Openofice files and zip files are detected properly. my simple tests are working: a OOo-Writer and a simpe zipfile are detected. [yenzenz]
